page.title: 18SURVEY OF OCCUPATIONS
page.content: A survey was held in which 60 children interviewed their parents on what they did for a living. The results were as follows:- {ARMED FORCES - 9 OFFICE PERSONNEL - 4 {CIVILIAN UNIFORMED SERVICES(Police {etc) - 7 EDUCATION - 10 {INDUSTRY(Factory) - 24 SERVICES - 11 {CONSUMER SERVICES - 21 { HOUSEWIVES-25 This list does not include those people who did not conveniently fit into any of the categories. Those not mentioned include an artist, a draughtsman, a diver, a lorry loader,a community worker, a metal supplier and a scientist. As there were no fathers or mothers put down as unemployed this survey cannot be considered as typical of most other areas.
